title: Mafia Ritualist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sacrifice a Mafia member to haunt another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sacrificing a Mafia member deals an Overkill attack to them and allows you to deal an Unstoppable attack to your second target.
- If you attempt to sacrifice a non-Mafia member, you will sacrifice yourself instead. You may also choose to sacrifice yourself normally.
- If you kill a Mafia member with your haunt, you can only sacrifice yourself for the rest of the game.
- You cannot sacrifice someone more than one time, if you were to be made able to use your ability multiple times at once by any means.
- You can keep a last will due to your practices being forbidden, but you don't care.
